column1: #Text=Wan says : " This is your prison now .
#Text=I will teach men to respect the spirits so that balance will be maintained .
#Text=" Wan says : " I will be the bridge between our two worlds .
#Text=" Fire lion turtle says : " The world is entering a new age .
#Text=We will no longer give humans the power of the elements .
#Text=" Wan says : " Different groups of people must learn to live together .
#Text=This is my mission : to use Raava 's light spirit to guide the world toward peace .
